query: query starwars($episode: String, $humanId: String, $droidId: String) { hero(episode: $episode) { id name friends { id appearsIn name  friends { id name appearsIn }   } appearsIn } human(id: $humanId) { id name friends { id appearsIn name  friends { id name appearsIn }     } appearsIn } droid(id: $droidId) { id name friends { id appearsIn name } appearsIn } }
